screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .dfti file in FlexiWrite
screenshot.caption: DFTI file open in FlexiWrite

description: The DFTI file is the main file type associated with FlexiWrite. It is created when you save your document and can be closed and opened at a later time. FlexiWrite uses the document similarly to how Word uses the .DOCX and .DOC files.
FlexiWrite is available to download for free as a native application for Macs. A Java archive ( .JAR ) version is available for Windows.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .dfti file in FlexiWrite
images.caption: DFTI file open in FlexiWrite
